description:
Constant (CONST) claims to combine the 'creditworthiness and price stability of the US Dollar with the technological advantages of blockchain technologies'. Constant is programmed to always be equal to the USD. Constant claims that the US dollars put in escrow are FDIC (Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation) insured. Each account is insured up to $250,000 by the independent trust company’s financial institution bond

name: Constant
